title: 10:00 am/pm lag spikes
body: I'm not sure whats going on but everyday at 10:00 am and 10:00 pm i end up hovering around 400 ping for an entire ranked match and it ends up costing me time and lp. is there any fix to this or is it just technical issues in chicago or something?

replies.body: It sounds like your network might be suffering from packet loss or instability.  I recommend running our[ log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going on.  It will also provide a list of instructions to fix this up, but let me know if you have any issues.  I'm happy to help!
